item.description:
The two following meetings are scheduled for those who live in Congressional District 7 to discuss how to help Ron Paul's ongoing campaign for the Presidency.

Wed.  April 4, 7pm
Sat. April 7, 1pm

These two meetings will be held at Pizzeria Regina in
Allston/Brighton. Here's the address:

353 Cambridge St
(between Highgate St&  Linden St)
Boston, MA 02134
(617) 783-2300
http://www.yelp.com/map/regina-pizzeria-boston-2

(Look for us in the large meeting hall in the back of the restaurant)

To find out which  congressional district you reside in double check here for the
'new district' locations:
http://www.wheredoivotema.com/bal/myelectioninfo.php
Scroll down for 'new district info.' to find out in which district you
are currently registered to vote. These meetings are for those who live
in Congressional District 7 (represented by Congressman Michael Capuano).

Feel free to give a call with questions.

Joe
857 350-0575

 

ps: We had a productive meeting on Sunday, April 1.
item.name: Helping Ron Paul's Campaign in District 7
